name: Greek Feta Chicken
author: sweet alice
summary: A simple, flavorful chicken dish. The feta cheese makes it special. You can also cook the chicken under the broiler.
ingredients: ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
directions: Mix yogurt, garlic, oregano, and black pepper together in a bowl
Add chicken to yogurt marinade, coating all sides
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Remove chicken from yogurt marinade; place on preheated grill
Cook for 6 minutes; flip and sprinkle with feta cheese
Cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 4 to 6 more minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
